biography.value: Lord Mayor of Greyhaven. Pragmatic, publicly clean, privately compromised for peace.

details.flaw: Allows Zhentarim smuggling to keep the town safe

greyhaven.visualMotif: Tall stone walls, civic banners, sealed ledgers

biography.value: Captain of the Greyhaven Militia and covert Harper operative.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Well-kept armor, eyes always scanning

biography.value: Devotee of Lathander. Leads the shrine and watches the Gloomwaste with wary faith.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Incense, dawn-sun iconography, warm candlelight

biography.value: Owner of the Rusty Tankard. Keeps a soft ledger and a hard smile.

details.flaw: Knows too much and sells it too easily

greyhaven.visualMotif: Pipe smoke, scarred oak bar, low laughter

biography.value: Innkeeper of the Wayfarer’s Rest. A magnet for road-news and quiet bargains.

details.flaw: Will hide trouble if it keeps rooms full

greyhaven.visualMotif: Stew-scented air, clean sheets, travel-stained boots by the hearth

biography.value: Former mercenary and adventurer. The only living local who has seen the outer ruins and returned.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Shaking hands, scarred knuckles, haunted stare
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Some of his 'lies' are true: he saw concentric walls and a keep that looked untouched by time.

biography.value: Matriarch of the Bramblefoot family, influential merchants and landholders.

details.flaw: Fears what her bloodline may awaken

greyhaven.visualMotif: Warm smile, sharper eyes, immaculate ledgers
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Bloodline tie to the lich’s mortal identity; Dora suppresses inherited arcane tendencies in the family.

biography.value: Dora’s eldest. Handles caravans and keeps the family’s hands clean-ish.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Ink-stained fingers, tidy vest, quick arithmetic

biography.value: Head of the Stoutheart household. Proud, stubborn, quietly generous.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Flour-dusted sleeves, iron keyring, steady gaze

biography.value: Halfling scout-for-hire. Fast feet, faster grin.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Short cloak, quick hands, bright buttons

biography.value: Grocer on Market Green. Keeps the freshest produce and the freshest gossip.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Bunches of herbs, chalkboard prices, jingling scale weights

biography.value: Butcher. Knows what predators do to livestock by the bite marks alone.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Apron stained dark, cleaver thump, salted meat smell

biography.value: General store owner. Buys and sells everything legal, and asks careful questions.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Wall of rope and lanterns, locked glass case, ledger under elbow
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Zhentarim sometimes use her back room for ‘short meetings’ without her consent.

biography.value: Smith. Repairs militia gear and quietly hates bandits.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Sparks, hammer-ring, soot-black hands

biography.value: Apprentice smith. Curious about the forbidden east road.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Soot-smudged cheeks, bright eyes, too-big gloves

biography.value: Carpenter and builder. Reinforces homes near the eastern edge.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Saw dust, measuring cord, nails in a mouth-corner

biography.value: Tailor. Can stitch hidden pockets or repair travel gear discreetly.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Measuring tape, neat pins, whispering shears
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Sometimes asked to alter clothes for Zhentarim; he pretends not to notice.

biography.value: Cobbler. Notices mud, ash, and strange dust on travelers’ boots.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Leather scraps, sharp awl, boots lined like soldiers

biography.value: Tanner on the town’s edge. Her vats stink; her knives are immaculate.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Sharp tannin smell, hanging hides, barking dogs

biography.value: Runs the sawmill. His crews won’t cut near the Gloomwaste anymore.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Fresh sap, saw whine, splintered gloves

biography.value: Runs the mill. Grain from east farms stopped years ago.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Flour dust, creaking wheel, river spray

biography.value: Keeps the grain and ration ledgers. Knows exactly when the town will start to starve.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Rope-sealed sacks, tally marks, dry grain smell

biography.value: Runs the stables. Horses spook when the wind blows from the Gloomwaste.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Hay dust, leather tack, anxious snorts

biography.value: Militia lieutenant. Loyal to Captain Voss, skeptical of the Mayor’s ‘arrangements’.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Worn spear haft, stern jaw, rain-stained cloak

biography.value: Town magistrate. Oversees punishments for disorder and spellcasting violations.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Ink-black robe trim, iron seal, cold smile

biography.value: A courteous ‘merchant’ who never sweats. Coordinates Zhentarim logistics around Greyhaven.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Clean gloves, polite bow, eyes like ink
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Direct contact for the Mayor’s ‘deal’. Knows the way to the north-road cavern waystation.

biography.value: Quiet farmwife south of town. Always has an extra bowl of stew for the right traveler.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Clean apron, wary smile, coded quilting patterns
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Harper hideout is her farmhouse. Knock pattern required: short-short-long.

biography.value: Leader of the Bloodcrust Orcs. Raids when the Gloomwaste ‘permits’ it.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Crusted red warpaint, bone charms, iron teeth
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: The lich’s agents occasionally ‘gift’ Mogra weapons in exchange for raids and sacrifices.

biography.value: Market broker who connects farmers to caravans. Talks like a ledger and smiles like a lock.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Wax seals, folded contracts, ink-stained cuffs
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Occasionally launders Zhentarim payments through ‘freight fees’.

biography.value: Wagonwright and carpenter. Keeps the south road wagons moving and the north road ones patched.

details.flaw: Can’t say no to a sob story

greyhaven.visualMotif: Fresh-cut oak, iron-rim wheels, grease-black thumbs

biography.value: A traveling minstrel who ‘just happens’ to be in the right taverns. Harper courier and rumor-gatherer.

details.ideal: Secrets should belong to the free
details.flaw: Flirts with danger for the story

greyhaven.visualMotif: Black feather charm, soft boots, too-bright grin
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Delivers coded songs to Captain Voss. Uses ‘crow verses’ to name targets.

biography.value: Militia sergeant. Runs the south road patrol roster and hates paperwork more than bandits.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Stamped roster sheets, whetstone rasp, scuffed greaves

biography.value: Night watch. Swears he hears ‘singing’ from the east when the fog rolls in.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Lantern halo, rattling keys, fog-wet cloak
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: His ‘singing’ is a faint planar harmonic from the lich’s work.

biography.value: Selene’s acolyte. Earnest. Keeps records of ‘miracles’ and ‘curses’.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Sunburst pin, ink-smudged prayerbook, nervous cough

biography.value: Halfling spice-seller. Her stall is always fragrant and always surrounded.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Cinnamon haze, tiny brass scoops, quick laughter

biography.value: Stoutheart farmer. Keeps goats on the north edge and watches the treeline like it owes him money.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Goat bells, muddy boots, sharpened hoe on shoulder

biography.value: Tamsin Pike’s teenage son. Collects weird stones from the riverbank and swears one ‘hums’.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Pocketful of pebbles, river smell, restless feet
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: The ‘humming’ stone is a tiny blight-tainted shard (safe for now). Could become a plot key.

biography.value: Runs a dwindling trade caravan on the north road. Has scars where ‘highwaymen’ had strange, black nails.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Leather map tube, whip crack, tired eyes
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: The ‘black nails’ are early blight-undeath signs: the highwaymen may be tainted.

biography.value: Independent roadwarden who scouts the north road for a fee. Calls the east road ‘a mouth that learned to chew.’

greyhaven.visualMotif: Grey braid, foxfur collar, notched arrows

biography.value: A quiet enforcer attached to Varron Dusk. Wears a ring with a tiny black serpent.

greyhaven.visualMotif: Knuckle scars, serpent ring, calm threat
greyhaven.gmOnlyNotes: Knows the cavern waystation route landmarks: ‘split pine’, ‘three stones’, ‘cold breath’.
